title: Real Estate
details: MERN Real Estate website, where users can book favorite house, cancel order, add reviews. Dashboard with admin panel, where user's & admin's routes are different.Admin can add new services, delete services, update status.
technologies: React.js, REST API, Firebase google sign in, Firebase email password registration and sign in, React router, Bootstrap5 CDN, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase hosting.

title: Travel Agency
details: MERN Travel website, where users can book favorite destinations & cancel order. Order status can be updated from 'Manage All Orders'.
technologies: React.js, REST API, Firebase google sign in, React router, Bootstrap5 CDN, Express.js, MongoBD, Heroku, Firebase Hosting.

title: Fitness Club
details: This React Single Page Application can be used for gym/ health care solution. Signed in users can see details of a training.
technologies: React.js, Firebase authentication, React router and private route, Bootstrap5 CDN, Firebase Hosting.
